mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mk_product_image(mkpi_name, mkpi_real_path, mkpi_uri, mkpi_size, mkpi_product_seq) VALUES (#{mkpi_name}, #{mkpi_real_path}, #{mkpi_uri}, #{mkpi_size}, #{mkpi_product_seq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mk_product_image WHERE mkpi_uri = #{uri} ORDER BY mkpi_seq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT mkpi_uri as uri FROM mk_product_image WHERE mkpi_product_seq=#{seq} ORDER BY mkpi_seq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT mkpi_name as name FROM mk_product_image WHERE mkpi_product_seq=#{seq} ORDER BY mkpi_seq DESC LIMIT 1
